snippet: Figures reported this week showed that industrial production in the euro zone fell 2.5 percent in September from the prior month, the largest monthly decline since January 2009. Production in Germany was off 2.1 percent.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column on reported figures that show industrial production in the euro zone fell 2.5 percent in September from August, largest monthly decline since January 2009; production in Germany was off 2.1 percent.
lead_paragraph: Figures reported this week showed that industrial production in the euro zone fell 2.5 percent in September from the prior month, the largest monthly decline since January 2009. Production in Germany was off 2.1 percent.

headline.print_headline: Sagging Production Is Affecting Even Germany
headline.seo: Industrial Production Sags, and Even Germany Is Affected
headline.main: Production Sags, and Even Germany Is Affected
